title: Michigan Farmers Forced to Destroy Edible Cherries to Prop Up Imports?
subtitle: A viral Facebook post about surplus U.S. cherry crops destroyed to "make room for imports" appeals to locavores but contains some inaccuracies.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A Michigan farmer was forced to destroy 40,000 edible cherries to make way for cherries imported from outside the U.S.
